options.title: -b, --ignore-leading-blanks
options.description: ignore leading blanks

options.title: -b, --ignore-leading-blanks
options.description: ignore leading blanks

options.title: -d, --dictionary-order
options.description: consider only blanks and alphanumeric characters

options.title: -d, --dictionary-order
options.description: consider only blanks and alphanumeric characters

options.title: -f, --ignore-case
options.description: fold lower case to upper case characters

options.title: -f, --ignore-case
options.description: fold lower case to upper case characters

options.title: -g, --general-numeric-sort
options.description: compare according to general numerical value

options.title: -g, --general-numeric-sort
options.description: compare according to general numerical value

options.title: -i, --ignore-nonprinting
options.description: consider only printable characters

options.title: -i, --ignore-nonprinting
options.description: consider only printable characters

options.title: -M, --month-sort
options.description: compare (unknown) < 'JAN' < ... < 'DEC'

options.title: -M, --month-sort
options.description: compare (unknown) < 'JAN' < ... < 'DEC'

options.title: -h, --human-numeric-sort
options.description: compare human readable numbers (e.g., 2K 1G)

options.title: -h, --human-numeric-sort
options.description: compare human readable numbers (e.g., 2K 1G)

options.title: -n, --numeric-sort
options.description: compare according to string numerical value

options.title: -n, --numeric-sort
options.description: compare according to string numerical value

options.title: -R, --random-sort
options.description: shuffle, but group identical keys. See shuf(1)

options.title: -R, --random-sort
options.description: shuffle, but group identical keys. See shuf(1)

options.title: --random-source=FILE
options.description: get random bytes from FILE

options.title: -r, --reverse
options.description: reverse the result of comparisons

options.title: -r, --reverse
options.description: reverse the result of comparisons

options.title: --sort=WORD
options.description:
sort according to WORD: general-numeric -g, human-numeric
      -h, month -M, numeric -n, random -R, version
      -V

options.title: -V, --version-sort
options.description: natural sort of (version) numbers within text

options.title: -V, --version-sort
options.description: natural sort of (version) numbers within text

options.title: --batch-size=NMERGE
options.description: merge at most NMERGE inputs at once; for more use temp files

options.title: -c, --check, --check=diagnose-first
options.description: check for sorted input; do not sort

options.title: -c, --check, --check=diagnose-first
options.description: check for sorted input; do not sort

options.title: -C, --check=quiet, --check=silent
options.description: like -c, but do not report first bad line

options.title: --compress-program=PROG
options.description: compress temporaries with PROG; decompress them with PROG -d

options.title: --debug
options.description:
annotate the part of the line used to sort, and warn about questionable
      usage to stderr

options.title: --files0-from=F
options.description:
read input from the files specified by NUL-terminated names in file F; If
      F is - then read names from standard input

options.title: -k, --key=KEYDEF
options.description: sort via a key; KEYDEF gives location and type

options.title: -k, --key=KEYDEF
options.description: sort via a key; KEYDEF gives location and type

options.title: -m, --merge
options.description: merge already sorted files; do not sort

options.title: -m, --merge
options.description: merge already sorted files; do not sort

options.title: -o, --output=FILE
options.description: write result to FILE instead of standard output

options.title: -o, --output=FILE
options.description: write result to FILE instead of standard output

options.title: -s, --stable
options.description: stabilize sort by disabling last-resort comparison

options.title: -s, --stable
options.description: stabilize sort by disabling last-resort comparison

options.title: -S, --buffer-size=SIZE
options.description: use SIZE for main memory buffer

options.title: -S, --buffer-size=SIZE
options.description: use SIZE for main memory buffer

options.title: -t, --field-separator=SEP
options.description: use SEP instead of non-blank to blank transition

options.title: -t, --field-separator=SEP
options.description: use SEP instead of non-blank to blank transition

options.title: -T, --temporary-directory=DIR
options.description:
use DIR for temporaries, not $TMPDIR or /tmp; multiple options
      specify multiple directories

options.title: -T, --temporary-directory=DIR
options.description:
use DIR for temporaries, not $TMPDIR or /tmp; multiple options
      specify multiple directories

options.title: --parallel=N
options.description: change the number of sorts run concurrently to N

options.title: -u, --unique
options.description:
with -c, check for strict ordering; without -c, output only
      the first of an equal run

options.title: -u, --unique
options.description:
with -c, check for strict ordering; without -c, output only
      the first of an equal run

options.title: -z, --zero-terminated
options.description: line delimiter is NUL, not newline

options.title: -z, --zero-terminated
options.description: line delimiter is NUL, not newline

options.title: --help
options.description: display this help and exit

options.title: --version
options.description: output version information and exit
